mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue ( id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address) VALUES ( #{clue.id}, #{clue.fullname}, #{clue.appellation}, #{clue.owner}, #{clue.company}, #{clue.job}, #{clue.email}, #{clue.phone}, #{clue.website}, #{clue.mphone}, #{clue.state}, #{clue.source}, #{clue.createBy}, #{clue.createTime}, #{clue.editBy}, #{clue.editTime}, #{clue.description}, #{clue.contactSummary}, #{clue.nextContactTime}, #{clue.address} )
